column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Omg! I was expecting actual deep dish pizza. Strike 1- the pizza delivery lady dropped the cutter In our food !ugh) we don't know where her hands have been! Then the pizza crust was flavorless and thin
column2: the pizza was full of oil and cheese. We didn't eat 80% of it! I was with 3 of my sisters visiting Chicago and not 1 of us liked the pizza. Then we order a cookie because we were starving and only the edges of the cookie were cooked. The inside was dough! Try Giordannos if you go. I heard they have actual deep dish with bread. It wasn't just us either. There were several others there disappointed
